title: Calories in Sour Cream
meta_description: Discover calories in sour cream per 100 g, including full nutrition breakdown with fat, carbs, protein, and tips for lighter options.
assumptions: Full-fat, cultured sour cream, plain; standard commercial variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fat content, brand, additives, and freshness. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of full-fat sour cream provides ~193 kcal and ~2.1 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Switch to light sour cream (reduced fat)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tbsp sour cream?
faqs.a: About 26 kcal for 1 tbsp (12 g) of full-fat sour cream.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in sour cream?
faqs.a: Per 100 g: 19.4 g total fat, including 12.1 g saturated.
Yes, about 4.6 g carbs per 100 g, mostly from lactose sugars.
Around 138 kcal per 100 g, lower due to reduced fat.

faqs.q: Is sour cream high in cholesterol?
faqs.a: Moderately: 71 mg per 100 g, mainly from dairy fat.
